title: Step 1 of 5: Select Goal
narrative: What’s your mission today? Choose a goal for UltraAI to pursue. You can pick one or more, or define your own custom goal.

title: Step 2 of 5: Enter Your Query
narrative: Describe your task in plain language. Attach files or media for deeper analysis, or adjust advanced settings.

title: Step 3 of 5: Model Selection
narrative: Choose which intelligence engines to use, or let UltraAI auto-select. Modes balance cost, speed, and accuracy.

options.label: Auto: Let UltraAI choose for me

title: Step 4 of 5: Choose Analysis Mode
narrative: Define how UltraAI orchestrates and refines the outputs. These modes are presented as internal cards/boxes with icons and descriptions.

options.label: Intelligence Multiplier
options.description: Blend the best insights from all models into one cohesive output.

options.label: Fact-check & Confidence
options.description: Rate truthfulness across models and provide confidence scores.

options.label: Devil’s Advocate
options.description: One model critiques another to expose blind spots and biases.

options.label: Convergence/Divergence
options.description: Highlight where models agree and where they differ significantly.

title: Step 5 of 5: Add-ons & Formatting
narrative: Choose how your result is delivered, secured, and polished. Select output format, export destination, and extra features.

options.label: Save or Send (Email, Drive, Dropbox, Notion)
